actions: Tonifies Qi and Blood, promotes the discharge of pus, generates flesh and expels toxins.
With Dang Gui, for Qi and Blood Deficiency with chronic non-healing sores.
Tonifies, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood, disperses Cold, reduces swelling, expels pus, generates flesh and alleviates pain.
With Huang Qi, for ulcerated abscesses with insufficient drainage or which drain a clear thin discharge.
With Jin Yin Hua, reduces obstruction and toxicity for swollen, painful sores and necrosis of surrounding tissue.
Clears Heat and resolves Fire toxicity.
With Zhi Gan Cao, for toxic swellings and sores.
Tonifies the Spleen, augments Qi, clears Heat, relieves Fire toxicity and moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs.

syndromes: Mastitis: Rupture Stage with discharge of pus

symptoms: Discharge of pus from the breast
Gradual return of normal body temperature
Gradual healing of the superficial lesions
